CustomField.description: The developer name of the field on this object that relates to to an account, e.g. AccountId. Should be set only if the object should be included as a standalone object, and not listed as child to another object.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The developer name of the field on this object that relates to to an account, e.g. AccountId. Should be set only if the object should be included as a standalone object, and not listed as child to another object.
CustomField.label: Account Id Field Name
